thread.title: Nina Dobrev in Red Dress Has Fans Spamming 'Stunning' - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Nina Dobrev in Red Dress Has Fans Spamming 'Stunning' - NewsBreak

author: Rishabh Shandilya
title: Nina Dobrev in Red Dress Has Fans Spamming 'Stunning' - NewsBreak
text:
By Rishabh Shandilya ,
26 minutes ago Image Credit: Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images Nina Dobrev , the Vampire Diaries star who’s always stealing the spotlight with her jet-set travel pics and killer fashion campaigns, is back in the headlines. Known as one of Hollywood’s most inspiring women and a strong voice for female empowerment, she’s now breaking the internet for a whole new reason. This time, Nina turned heads at the CFDA Awards, rocking a jaw-dropping red dress that had fans and fashion insiders completely losing it online.
Nina Dobrev stuns in a red dress Nina Dobrev stole the show at the 2025 CFDA Fashion Fund Dinner, and fans can’t stop talking about her stunning look.
The Vampire Diaries star showed up in a red gown by ASHLYN, one of Hollywood’s most buzzed-about designers. The sleeveless dress featured a sleek, structured design with a fitted bodice that flowed into a flawless floor-length skirt.
Nina paired it with matching red gloves that gave the outfit a chic look. Keeping it classy, she skipped heavy jewellery and let the bold gown do all the talking.
Fans instantly lost it online, flooding Dobrev’s Instagram with comments calling Dobrev “gorgeous” and “the most beautiful woman in the world.”
The post Nina Dobrev in Red Dress Has Fans Spamming ‘Stunning’ appeared first on Mandatory .
